pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'ESRI' Bindings for the 'leaflet' Package // An add-on package to the 'leaflet' package, which provides bindings for 'ESRI' services. This package allows a user to add 'ESRI' provided services such as 'MapService', 'ImageMapService', 'TiledMapService' etc. to a 'leaflet' map.
